# Terraform variables

This document gives an overview of variables used in the platform of the terraform-tags.

## Requirements

| Name      | Version |
| --------- | ------- |
| terraform | >= 0.13 |

## Providers

No provider.

## Inputs

| Name | Description | Type | Default | Required |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | :-: |
| attributes | Additional attributes (e.g. `1`) | `list(string)` | `[]` | no |
| config | Single object for setting entire configuration at once.<br>See description of individual variables for details. | `any` | <pre>{<br> "delimiter": null,<br> "label_key_case": null,<br> "label_order": [],<br> "label_value_case": null,<br> "regex_replace_chars": null<br>}</pre> | no |
| environment | Environment, e.g. 'uw2', 'us-west-2', OR 'prod', 'staging', 'dev', 'UAT' | `string` | `null` | no |
| name | Solution name, e.g. 'app' or 'jenkins' | `string` | `null` | no |
| namespace | Namespace, which could be your organization name or abbreviation, e.g. 'eg' or 'cp' | `string` | `null` | no |
| stage | Stage, e.g. 'prod', 'staging', 'dev', OR 'source', 'build', 'test', 'deploy', 'release' | `string` | `null` | no |
| tags | Additional tags (e.g. `map('BusinessUnit','XYZ')` | `map(string)` | `{}` | no |

## Outputs

| Name        | Description                                                                    |
| ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| attributes  | List of attributes                                                             |
| delimiter   | Delimiter between `namespace`, `environment`, `stage`, `name` and `attributes` |
| environment | Normalized environment                                                         |
| label_order | The naming order actually used to create the ID                                |
| name        | Normalized name                                                                |
| name32      | first 32 chars of string name                                                  |
| name6       | first 6 chars of string name                                                   |
| namespace   | Normalized namespace                                                           |
| stage       | Normalized stage                                                               |
| tags        | Tags as a map (includes a `Name` tag)                                          |
